DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of this registry are to assess the use of the thrombin-specific anticoagulant bivalirudin during percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) in a real life setting. In particular, data will be collected to analyze experiences of bivalirudin use in respect to the following objectives; - examine the aspects of safety and effectiveness of bivalirudin - gain experience regarding the characteristics of patients in bivalirudin treatment - evaluate the handling of bivalirudin and its practicality
DOC.criteria: > 18 years, undergoing planned or urgent PCI with the intention to use bivalirudin as anticoagulant, written informed concent to entry of data information registry.
